author: @farzadkhadem5119
text: Summary of instructions here:  - Open the scripts folder in python directory by holding shift and righ clicking and  selecting 'open command window here' - Type pip install X where X is the name of any of the packages available on the 'python package index' at the following address    https://pypi.python.org/pypi  - There is no need to download packages, pip will do it automatically   IMPORTANT if you get following error:    'Unable to find vcvarsall.bat' then the package hosted on 'pypi' is not the proper one for your system or python version. The fix is to go to the following website:   http://www.lfd.uci.edu/~gohlke/pythonlibs/  and download the proper wheel file (.whl) for your pyhton version and operating  system. Then open the download folder and by shift right clicking open a command window in the download folder and then type this:  c:\python34\scripts\pip install X.whl    where 'X' is the exact name of the whl file you downloaded (you can press the tab button after the word install in the above command to cycle through the files until you get to the whl file so you don't have to type the name). Press enter and the installation begins.
